name: Eternal Memory demo
description:
A physical controller is highly recommended for the best experience 

Overview 

Eternal Memory is a top-down action rpg in the same vein as the Legend of Zelda and Alundra. This game is built with a metroidvania sense of progression as you'll be able to explore a small chunk of the demo.

Story

The story goes as this: you awake in a strange room full of old and decaying equipment with a single (give or take) goal. Find out where you are and what happened here.

Features

-Tight and fast gameplay 

-Handrawn graphics cramed into 4 kilobytes of ram

-Psudo 3D graphics 

-Sprite scaling all done in software

-Sampled music 

-Massive bosses

-Meth

-Sprite viewer

-A sick as hell minigame if you want some extra fun

-Sound test

-A partner system to enhance combat and overworld traversal.
